mapper.select: SELECT i.*,build_number as `houseOwner.houseInfo.buildInfo.buildNumber`,house_unit as `houseOwner.houseInfo.houseUnit`,h.owner_name as `houseOwner.ownerName`,hi.house_number as `houseOwner.houseInfo.houseNumber`, t.pay_type_name as `payInfo.payType.payTypeName`,pi.pay_info_money as `payInfo.payInfoMoney`,pi.pay_info_start_time as `payInfo.payInfoStartTime`, pi.pay_info_end_time as `payInfo.payInfoEndTime`, m.method_name as `payMethod.methodName` FROM pay_info_details i LEFT JOIN house_owner h ON h.owner_id=i.owner_id LEFT JOIN house_info hi ON h.house_id=hi.house_id LEFT JOIN building_info b ON b.build_id=hi.build_id LEFT JOIN pay_method m ON m.method_id=i.method_id LEFT JOIN pay_info pi ON pi.pay_info_id=i.pay_info_id LEFT JOIN pay_type t ON t.pay_type_id=pi.pay_type_id order by i.pay_state,i.pay_info_id,hi.house_number
SELECT method_id FROM pay_method WHERE method_name=#{methodName}
SELECT SUM(i.pay_info_money) FROM pay_info_details d LEFT JOIN pay_info i ON i.pay_info_id=d.pay_info_id WHERE owner_id=#{ownerId}
SELECT SUM(i.pay_info_money) FROM pay_info_details d LEFT JOIN pay_info i ON i.pay_info_id=d.pay_info_id WHERE pay_state=1 and owner_id=#{ownerId}
